argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_atnemeq0 | |- ( ( A e. HAtoms /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( A =/= B <-> ( A i^i B ) = 0H ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_atelch | |- ( A e. HAtoms -> A e. CH ) |
| 3 |  | #P_cvp | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( ( A i^i B ) = 0H <-> A <oH ( A vH B ) ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( A e. HAtoms /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( ( A i^i B ) = 0H <-> A <oH ( A vH B ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_atcv0 | |- ( A e. HAtoms -> 0H <oH A ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. HAtoms /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> 0H <oH A ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_biantrurd | |- ( ( A e. HAtoms /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( A <oH ( A vH B ) <-> ( 0H <oH A /\ A <oH ( A vH B ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 4, 7 | #P_3bitrd | |- ( ( A e. HAtoms /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( A =/= B <-> ( 0H <oH A /\ A <oH ( A vH B ) ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_atelch | |- ( B e. HAtoms -> B e. CH ) |
| 10 |  | #P_chjcl | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) -> ( A vH B ) e. CH ) |
| 11 |  | #P_h0elch | |- 0H e. CH |
| 12 |  | #P_cvntr | |- ( ( 0H e. CH /\ A e. CH /\ ( A vH B ) e. CH ) -> ( ( 0H <oH A /\ A <oH ( A vH B ) ) -> -. 0H <oH ( A vH B ) ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_mp3an1 | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ ( A vH B ) e. CH ) -> ( ( 0H <oH A /\ A <oH ( A vH B ) ) -> -. 0H <oH ( A vH B ) ) ) |
| 14 | 10, 13 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) -> ( ( 0H <oH A /\ A <oH ( A vH B ) ) -> -. 0H <oH ( A vH B ) ) ) |
| 15 | 2, 9, 14 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( A e. HAtoms /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( ( 0H <oH A /\ A <oH ( A vH B ) ) -> -. 0H <oH ( A vH B ) ) ) |
| 16 | 8, 15 | #P_sylbid | |- ( ( A e. HAtoms /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( A =/= B -> -. 0H <oH ( A vH B ) ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_necon4ad | |- ( ( A e. HAtoms /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( 0H <oH ( A vH B ) -> A = B ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( A = B -> ( A vH B ) = ( B vH B ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_chjidm | |- ( B e. CH -> ( B vH B ) = B ) |
| 20 | 9, 19 | #P_syl | |- ( B e. HAtoms -> ( B vH B ) = B ) |
| 21 | 18, 20 | #P_sylan9eq | |- ( ( A = B /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( A vH B ) = B ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( A = B /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> B = ( A vH B ) ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( A = B /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( B e. HAtoms <-> ( A vH B ) e. HAtoms ) ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_ex | |- ( A = B -> ( B e. HAtoms -> ( B e. HAtoms <-> ( A vH B ) e. HAtoms ) ) ) |
| 25 | 24 | #P_ibd | |- ( A = B -> ( B e. HAtoms -> ( A vH B ) e. HAtoms ) ) |
| 26 |  | #P_atcv0 | |- ( ( A vH B ) e. HAtoms -> 0H <oH ( A vH B ) ) |

| 28 | 27 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. HAtoms /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( A = B -> 0H <oH ( A vH B ) ) ) |
| 29 | 17, 28 | #P_impbid | |- ( ( A e. HAtoms /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( 0H <oH ( A vH B ) <-> A = B ) ) |
